turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yo. Yo. Yo. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can i help you with today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok thats 2 small pizzas right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes. I would like two small pizzas. Well, on the first pizza, I would like to have chicken barbecue. On the second pizza, I like the Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you repeat your order please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two small pizzas, one chicken barbecue, one meat lovers, and both of them, please, please, do the thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me repeat your order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thats 2 small pizzas, 1 check bbq, 1 meat lover, both with thin crust is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds correct. And this is Bella Luna Pizzeria, right? Just make sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: correct, it will be ordered from Bella Luna pizzeria.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, let's let's order those two pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it. Is it Is there delivery or is there pickup? What kind of What we're doing here?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes it will be for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Order the pizza, and let me know when they're it's ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so thats 2 small pizzas, 1 chicken bbq, 1 meat lover, both with thin crust your total will be 30 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is quite expensive. Is there any coupons I can use?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: shall we confirm the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check that real quick for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i am sorry there aren't any deals available right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Man, that's kind of sucks. Alright. Just send the order, and I'll go pick up the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what is shortly? Like 30 minutes here? Give me a time frame.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's correct, 30 min for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you very much. That That will be it. I'll I'll go pick up the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.
